name: Outdr Widget
author: Outdr Ltd

sections.description:
By adding a friendly and responsive chat-style booking experience to your website, that immediately engages potential customers, you can ensure that you receive all the information you need to reply immediately.

Rather than just using emails, the Outdr Booking Widget is linked directly to your school’s Outdr.com account, allowing you to view and manage all booking requests through your Outdr.com dashboard. Email notifications are sent to you every step of the way.

When your customers confirm a booking, the desposit payment is made securely online, and directly into your account.

The booking widget sends form contents to Outdr.com. Please review Outdr.com‘s privacy policy and terms of service before including this widget on your site.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/outdr-booking-widget directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. In the menu, navigate to the Settings / Outdr section, to configure the Outdr Booking Widget for your school
  4. Add the plugin to one of your pages
sections.faq:
How do I get an Outdr account for my school?

If you would like to become an Outdr activity provider, please contact support@outdr.com. We would be happy to assist.

Where do I find my school ID?

Your school ID can be found in the URL of your Outdr school management screen. For example if your management screen is at https://outdr.com/manage/school/my-kite-school then your school ID will be my-kite-school.
